index.lead: Feedback Sensei enables you to report problems and send us your comments in order to help us improve our applications.
index.instructions: Please select the application you are experiencing an issue with or would like to comment on.

form.thanksP1: Thank you for helping us improve
form.thanksP2: your feedback is important to us!

result.errorText: An error occurred while sending your comments.
result.confirmText: Your feedback has been submitted successfully.
